medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began with significant weight loss of over 20 lbs over the past 2.5 months, following previous surgeries including loop gastrojejunostomy and J-tube feeding for duodenal necrosis and fistulization. The patient is status post loop gastrojejunostomy and J-tube placement.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus (borderline), Hypertension, Hyperlipidemia, possible Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (from chronic smoking), Nephrolithiasis, Cholelithiasis, Benign Prostatic Hyperplasia, status post inguinal hernia repair, status post left finger amputation, status post embolization of spontaneous rupture of pancreaticoduodenal artery aneurysms x2.
medical_history.family_history: Father with cancer, mother with unspecified cancer.
